content.heading: Internet of Things (IoT)
content.description: At Augmented Transformation, the Internet of Things (IoT) helps people live and work smarter, providing complete control over daily activities For businesses, IoT is crucial in driving automation and informed decision-making. Our design approach is unique, featuring a modular device structure with customizable modules like CAN, RFID, and WiFi available on demand. Devices are configured and assembled according to customer specifications, ensuring tailored solutions.
